entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160

Closed

  • PublishTrimmed build time regression. #40060

PullRequests

Created

  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add nuget-team as CODEOWNER for dotnet-list-package #40139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Area-Workloads
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Update warning message for containers package detection when building SDK-containerizable project types #39956
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
